author: La 100
title: La dolorosa confesión de Maru Botana sobre el bullying a su hijo: "Lo acompañé"
text:
[Maru Botana le respondió sin filtro a Yanina Latorre y le hizo una jugada invitación: “Tu hija es fanática”Opens in new window ]
Maru Botana contó a corazón abierto el difícil momento que está atravesando su hijo, quien fue víctima de bullying en su escuela. También, habló de cómo sobrellevaron junto a su familia la situación que vivió el pequeño.
Mirá También: Tildaron de mugrienta a Maru Botana y las pruebas desataron un escándalo: “Está rebalsado”
Maru Botana relató cómo ella y su familia lograron salir adelante
Maru Botana comentó en Desayuno Americano “Me tocó. Es horrible, te pone muy mal, sobre todo porque sos mamá”, comenzó, al ser consultada sobre si había tenido que enfrentar una situación así en su familia. La aclamada cocinera reflexionó además sobre la importancia de escuchar y acompañar en conjunto a los hijos.
Maru Botana agregó que la pedagogía de la escuela jugó un papel muy importante en el desarrollo del conflicto “Creo que mis hijos van a un colegio donde la verdad charla mucho con los chicos y tienen mucha unión. Y bueno, la escuela lo ayuda un montón. Así que súper agradecida”, confió la madre del niño.
Según Maru Botana este tipo de problemáticas escapan a cualquier contexto social y económico, por lo que estas experiencias son parte de la vida cotidiana, “Creo que es algo que pasa a todo nivel. Hoy no tiene mucha diferencia de clase social. Es triste que pase, es peligroso que pase. Creo que es de mucha charla con los hijos”.
Mirá También: Maru Botana le respondió sin filtro a Yanina Latorre y le hizo una jugada invitación: “Tu hija es fanática”
Maru Botana opinó sobre el acoso escolar y el contexto el que se da
Maru Botana, madre de una numerosa familia, compartió de qué forma cree que se generan estas situaciones, “Y creo que es algo que se tiene que tratar de solucionar y trabajarlo con tus hijos porque a veces también se da el bullying, por qué se produce".
“Si es porque tu hijo está en alguna situación especial o viste qué es lo que se genera en ese momento”, dijo.
Por último, Maru Botana expresó el amor incondicional que le tiene a sus hijos y como eso los fortalece, “Lo acompañé, fortalecí, estuve al lado... y vas tratando de estar viendo que no ser la mami desesperada, de ‘mi hijito, qué le pasa?‘. Tenés que ir acompañando y viendo un poco cómo se va desarrollando todo”.

author: Mltjones
title: Google nest doorbell (battery)- Not working
text:
5m ago
Hello!
I am having issues with my Google nest doorbell. No problem setting up—smooth sailing! Current issue is doorbell is not chiming inside the home on the mechanical chime doorbell. Follow the directions to a T. Mechanical chime does work on previous doorbell. When I go on the Google app to try to turn on indoor chime it is grayed out.
is there an additional item I need to purchase to get it to chime in the home? Can I use my existing mechanical chime? Please help there’s a driving me mad.

author: Jarvis the NPC
title: Skull and Bones: Players Call BS on Unbeatable NPC Ships
text:
Skull and Bones has taken a stab at the high seas of gaming with a realistic pirate experience, but it looks like some players are feeling a little more than just slighted. With frustration brewing over the unbeatable NPC ships, players are crying foul about the battle mechanics that require more than just swashbuckling skills to overcome. Thanks to a recent post by user BadCheese31, players are digging their heels in about encounters where NPC ships are not just hard to take down, but seemingly impossible, and the community is joining in with their own salty tales. What’s the deal with these health-replenishing ships that just won’t quit? Buckle up, we’re diving into the murky waters of player frustrations.
Summary
- Players are frustrated with what they perceive to be unbeatable NPC ships in Skull and Bones, sparking heated discussions.
- The existence of repair ships that can heal other vessels at an alarming rate has become a central point of contention.
- Community members are split between suggesting tactical strategies and questioning the game’s balance.
- Some players feel the difficulty is unrealistically steep, akin to an impossible boss fight.
The NPC Ship Enigma
The crux of the players’ outrage stems from a key element of combat: NPC ships that seem to have hit the gym and taken every health potion they can find. BadCheese31 ruffled a few feathers by posting about a specific encounter where a foe just wouldn’t go down, no matter how hard they pummeled it with cannon fire. “How can it heal faster than six ships shooting at it?” they lamented. It’s like trying to sink the Titanic with just water balloons. The mechanics have players feeling like they’re just shooting blanks, with the NPCs soaking up all their damage. The player’s frustration is palpable, as they argue that while a challenge is welcome, this is akin to being stranded on a deserted island with only bananas and no coconuts.
What truly gets players riled up isn’t just the health factor—it’s the feels like cheating aspect of the situation. In a game where teamwork and strategy should reign, the apparent imbalance raises questions about the design choices made by the developers. If players are to feel as strong, brave, and legendary as the pirate personas they embody, then battles against NPCs should also reflect that power fantasy.
Aiding the Cause: Repair Ships?
A recurring theme in the comment section deals with repair ships, which several players suggest should be targeted first in battle. “You have to kill the repair ships. Those should be your first priority,” suggests one commenter, revealing the necessity of strategic planning. Others back this sentiment, insisting that players need to engage their “brain cells” if they want to stand a chance in this digital pirateland.
The crowd’s suggestions hint that this could be more about tactics than outright game imbalances. One user noted, “Ship probably had the shell shocked heal,” referencing a specific perk that allows certain ships to heal whenever they fire their weapons. With players discovering these hidden mechanics, the narrative starts to shift from a simple complaint to a call for adaptability. It turns the scenario into a chess game; one where ignoring important pieces leads to swift defeat.
The Healing Heavies Debate
As the conversation deepens, opinions vary wildly, with some players adamantly declaring, “Git Gud. Your on world rank 2 it’s supposed to be very hard.” The notion that difficulty is a fundamental part of the experience is supported by a faction that relishes the challenge, brushing off the cries for help as just a part of the pirating experience. After all, isn’t overcoming obstacles what makes piracy so appealing?
Yet, while challenging gameplay is appreciated, the key lies in balance. Players desire an experience that pushes them to their limits without leading to frustration. Having NPC ships that feel invincible—especially those that can continually heal—leaves many players feeling like they are in a blender of chaos, where the satisfaction of victory starts to feel like a cruel joke rather than a triumphant achievement.
Community-Sourced Strategies
While some players express their frustrations, the community also comes together to provide tips and strategies. “Kill the repair ship first. This is not WT1… you have to use some brain cells,” advises a user going by Quiet_Beyond_1657. This advice has sparked a whole new wave of discussions around tactics in engaging with tougher NPCs.
In fact, there appear to be a few lightbulb moments for players who, amid their vexation, have slowly started to piece together methods for overcoming their digital foes. Suggestions about formations, targeting order, and even specific weapons have turned the comment section into a brainstorming session that gives credence to the notion that there’s still a glimmer of hope.
What’s particularly amusing is how, even in a melting pot of complaints, there’s an undeniable spirit of camaraderie. Players are supporting one another, sharing tales of legendary crashes and ridiculous ship designs all while rallying their fellow pirates to rise against these monstrous NPC ships. It’s like a pirate club; a wacky, digital version of Moby Dick, where the whale is actually made up of various NPC ships that seem like they’re defying the laws of physics.
As Skull and Bones players band together to navigate through these turbulent waters, their experience encapsulates a critical junction in gaming community culture. It’s not just about bemoaning the obstacles—they’re also collaborating, strategizing, and learning in the process. The variety of perspectives showcases an engaging mix of protection, learning, and, let’s not forget, a dash of humor that resonates throughout.
Whether this penchant for balance adjustment or skill mastering will lead to a smoother sailing experience in the future remains to be seen. For now, players are maintaining their pirate pride, tackling NPC foes, and laughing through the struggle, proving once more that even the most frustrating game experiences can bring about a swashbuckling sense of community.

author: Neeraj Bansal
title: GTA Online's new gun is not available for some players
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } Follow Us Share 0 Discuss 0 Discuss What's your opinion? GTA Online's new gun is not available for some players Discuss Now GTA Online has a new gun (Image via Rockstar Games) It’s 2025, and there’s a new gun in GTA Online that players can now use – the El Strickler. Rockstar Games has brought the assault rifle to the game as part of the Agents of Sabotage DLC content. After being exclusively available for GTA+ subscribers for a month, the weapon has finally been made purchasable. However, some players can’t access it.
GTA Online’s new gun is currently available on the game’s Expanded and Enhanced edition. Only PS5 and Xbox Series X|S users can access it, making it exclusive content for current-gen consoles. The weapon is unavailable for players on the PS4, Xbox One, and PC.
GTA Online’s new gun is a variant of the Military Rifle Trending The El Strickler Military Rifle is a variant of the standard Vom Feuer Military Rifle in GTA Online. As per Rockstar Games' in-game description, the newest version of the weapon is designed in the presence of firearms specialist Juan Strickler, the main character players encounter during The Cayo Perico Heist.
Players can buy Grand Theft Auto Online’s new gun from the Gun Van for $695,000. Here’s how the Gun Van describes the weapon:
“Nothing screams “Class Act” like gunning down disloyal lackeys with a gold-plated Military Rifle. This custom design was personally overseen by noted firearms specialist Juan Strickler.” The assault rifle seems to be based on the real-life Steyr AUG A3; KH-2002 and comes pre-equipped with the following features:
Scope (Medium-range zoom functionality) Extended clip (45 rounds) Blue tracer rounds Blue-tinted flashlight (Aids low light target acquisition) Blue & gold engraved exterior Players can also buy additional ammo for $120 per 90 rounds.
When it comes to performance, the new Military Rifle performs decently. According to the in-game files, here are its performance stats:
Damage: 38/100 Fire Rate: 55/100 Accuracy: 45/100 Range: 45/100 Clip Size: 40/100 While the new El Strickler is unavailable for last-gen console and PC gamers, the bonuses added with the Grand Theft Auto Online weekly update are claimable by all players.
One can also get a new podium vehicle at The Diamond Casino & Resort by January 15, 2025.

author: DTNEXT Bureau
title: Wedding videographer operates drone over Russian consulate in Chennai
text: Wedding videographer operates drone over Russian consulate in Chennai The police team traced the drone and seized it e, which was used by the videographer R Gokul (23), of Kalpakkam to film the marriage of a couple. CHENNAI: Mylapore police detained a man and seized a drone from him for allegedly flying it near the Consulate General of the Russian Federation on Santhome Main Road on Wednesday. The police team traced the drone and seized it e, which was used by the videographer R Gokul (23), of Kalpakkam to film the marriage of a couple. Inquiries revealed that he was a videographer shooting a marriage function at a school in Santhome. When a policeman on guard duty at the Consulate General of the Russian Federation spotted the drone flying over the high-security premises, he informed his higher up after which the UAV was seized. During questioning the drone operator told the police UAV took a detour and went far ahead. He also informed police that he was not aware of the Consulate General of the Russian Federation office at Santhome. Further inquiries revealed that the suspect owns the drone which he had been using to film the marriage function. The Mylapore police team seized the drone and let Gokul go home after getting an undertaking from him.

organizations.name: consulate general of the russian federation

author: Alex Myers
title: 15(!)-year-old shoots front-nine 31(!!) in Korn Ferry Tour debut | Golf News and Tour Information | GolfDigest.com
text:
As the old saying goes, the kids are alright. But that phrase doesn't do one particularly precocious golfer justice.
If you've followed the junior golf circuit over the past couple years at all, you've probably heard the name Miles Russell. If you haven't, this is name golf fans might want to learn. Quickly.
RELATED: Just how good is Charlie Woods?
That's because Miles is not your normal 15-year-old. He's the reigning AJGA Player of the Year. He signed an NIL deal with Transcend Capital Advisors last fall. And on Thursday, he put forth a pretty darn special debut on the Korn Ferry Tour.
Playing in the LECOM Suncoast Classic , Russell shot a front-nine 31 to place himself among the early leaders at Lakewood National Golf Club in Lakewood Ranch, Florida. That's right, the 15-year-old needed only 31 strokes to complete his opening nine holes in his first PGA Tour-sanctioned event.
RELATED: This Korn Ferry Tour first-tee announcer is worth the price of admission
Russell cooled off on the back nine with a 37, but the lefty still recorded a three-under-par 68. He's currently four shots behind a group at seven under.
Then again, we shouldn't be too surprised. Not only did he win the Junior Players Championship last year, but he also shot a second-round 66 at TPC Sawgrass. And he won the Junior PGA Championship by seven shots before playing in the Junior Ryder Cup in September.
Still, doing it against adult tour pros is different.
RELATED: Golf's all-time biggest phenoms
“I don’t know what to expect, but I’d love to make the cut and who knows, maybe have a good weekend and see where it puts me,” Russell told PGATour.com on Tuesday.
Good start, young man. Good start.
RELATED: Why the world's top-ranked amateur is staying in school

author: /cronologia/-/meta/staff
title: ¿Qué color debemos vestir el 31 de diciembre ?
text: Es tiempo de pensar sobre que deseamos para el año nuevo y poner todas nuestras buenas vibraciones para que sucedan. Existen una serie de [rituales de Año Nuevo ](https://www.laprensa.hn/fotogalerias/farandula/mexico-espectaculos-ritual-galilea-montijo-atraer-dinero-ano-nuevo-HF16750744#image-1)en diversos países que muchos siguen para llamar a la suerte, trabajo y fortuna. ¿Sabías, por ejemplo, que las personas en Brasil visten ropa interior con los colores que representan lo que ellos quieren para el nuevo año? Así que es muy común ver personas con ropas blancas que probablemente dentro visten una ropa interior secreta con el color de sus deseos. Recibir el [año 2024 ](https://www.laprensa.hn/fotogalerias/mundo/rituales-supersticiones-tradiciones-fin-ano-nuevo-ano-2018-2019-EDLP1245414#image-1)es muy importante, pues todos deseamos que sea todo lo opuesto de 2023, así que para que sea el mejor, cada detalle cuenta. Es por esto que aquí te dejamos una lista de colores que puedes utilizar la noche del 31 de diciembre, que te ayudarán a atraer buenas cosas. Lee: [ Tendencia: el poder del verde acqua este fin de año](https://www.laprensa.hn/amiga/tendencia-verde-acqua-moda-psicologia-color-DF16461103) Dorado. El dorado es el color de la abundancia. Utiliza este color si estás buscando la riqueza y el éxito profesional. Rojo. Simboliza la alegría, el valor y la fuerza. Además, el rojo es el color de la pasión. Úsalo si deseas aumentarla en el siguiente año. Negro. Aunque puede ser fácilmente asociado al luto y la tristeza, dale una oportunidad; sin embargo, es elegante y significa poder. Utilízalo para llevar un look poderosísimo. Blanco. El color más apacible de todos. Significa purificación y puede ayudarte a dejar atrás todas las malas experiencias para empezar de nuevo. Además, si hablamos de estilo, puede combinarse con absolutamente todos los colores. Turquesa. El turquesa atrae el dinero y las buenas relaciones de pareja, por lo que llevarlo para recibir el Año Nuevo no es la peor idea de todas. No es un color común en las tendencias de esta temporada, pero puedes encontrar accesorios y ensambles para combinarlos con negro, blanco o ambos. Plateado. ¿Deseas el año 2024 lleno de emociones nuevas, diversión y éxito? Entonces el plateado será el indicado para recibir tu año nuevo. Azul. La tranquilidad, armonía y serenidad son unas de las energías que podemos atraer al usar este color en el recibimiento del nuevo año. Púrpura o violeta: Estos son los colores de la intuición. Es perfecto para quienes buscan respuestas el próximo año. Este es un buen momento para despejar la mente y considerar qué camino es mejor. También: [Ideas de maquillaje para lucirte en Navidad y Año Nuevo](https://www.laprensa.hn/amiga/ideas-maquillaje-lucirte-navidad-ano-nuevo-tendencias-2023-lovely-studio-FC16721242#image-1)

author: news@irishmirror.ie (Brendan Furlong)
title: 'Freak weather' rips through Wexford house 'like a train' - leaving other homes nearby untouched
text:
A freak weather event which tore through a Wexford house 'like a train' has left sheet metal and debris scattered across fields and ditches up to a kilometre away.
A severe wind during Storm Gerrit which locals in the village of Duncormick in South Wexford described as being like a tornado, ripped through the home in the early hours of Thursday morning.
Local Aontu Cllr. Jim Codd, was at the scene at first light and said the damage caused was 'colossal'.
READ MORE:
Ireland New Year’s weather misery as Met Eireann issues multiple warnings for fierce double blast
'I can only think it was a tornado because it came after the winds which raged all night and only one house was hit,' he said.
'It's quite astonishing to see the amount of damage done to the house, the family described it to me as 'like a train went through the house'.
'As I drove up here I saw sheets of metal lying in the ditches half a mile away from the property, there was debris scattered across the fields,' he added.
'Thankfully despite part of the roof being blown off, the family were unhurt by the storm and are focused on repairing the damage as best they can lest further adverse weather hit South Wexford.
'While a tarpaulin has been erected to cover the holes in the roof, the sheds and buildings in the back yard have been 'completely flattened' with parts of them unlikely to ever be recovered,' he said.
Remarkably, the house in Woodgraigue, Duncormick, was the only one impacted by the weather event, with neighbouring properties escaping completely unscathed.
'No other house in the area was touched, the one across the road, not 300 metres away, avoided it completely,' confirmed Cllr. Codd.
A
GoFundMe page has been set up to help with the associated costs of repairing the house.
